subject: Vat on UK delivery
description_text: Hello, Please can you confirm if the GBP prices on your website and inclusive of VAT and import charges? It doesn't confirm if VAT is included on checkout, the item price is Â£169 including shipping (plus x pedals x2 plus baseplate) Thanks Lee

conversations.body_text: Hi Lee Corbin,    Yes, all fees included.

Thank you, I have placed the order and look forward to receiving the pedals shortly.
Kind regards
Lee
